chinese: Danny, 晚餐太棒了!
english: Danny, this is a wonderful meal.

chinese: 你来和我一块儿住吧.
english: Please come and live with me.

chinese: 你以为他每天都这样吗?
english: Do you think he does this all the time?

chinese: Lisa, 我们的生活状况你是清楚的.
english: Lisa, you see how we live.

chinese: 你问问Hannah她是不是也想沦落成我们这样.
english: Ask Hannah if she wants to sink to our level.

chinese: 这顿饭的确是异乎寻常的好.
english: This is unusually civilized.

chinese: 我平时可不经常做调味酱.
english: It's not often I make my sauce.

chinese: 我想知道这和你妈妈做的调味酱是不是一样的.
english: I want to know if this is your mother's sauce.

chinese: 做法基本上一样,
english: The basic recipe is the same,

chinese: 只是我还加了一些我妈妈不会同意放的东西.
english: but I put in a few things my mother would not approve of.

chinese: 我打破了几条常规.
english: I broke a couple of the rules.

chinese: 你妈妈做意大利面的调味酱也有规矩吗?
english: Your mother has rules about spaghetti sauce?

chinese: 当然有啦!
english: Of course!

chinese: 我妈妈的规矩是关于衣服的.
english: My mother's rules are about clothes.

chinese: 比如说?
english: Like what?

chinese: 比如说裙子的长度. 不许我穿迷你裙.
english: Like skirt length. No minis.

chinese: 没劲.
english: Bummer.

chinese: 没劲.
english: Bummer.

chinese: 我读中学的时候, 她老是问我是不是打算就这样穿着迷你裙出门.
english: In high school she'd always ask me if I intended to leave the house that way.

chinese: 那你第一次从大学回家时她肯定大吃一惊.
english: She must have been surprised the first time you came home from college.

chinese: Oh 是的.
english: Oh yes.

chinese: 我爸妈还不是一样.
english: My parents sure were.

chinese: 我爸爸这个人有一条原则: 人得实际一点儿.
english: My dad has one rule: be practical.

chinese: 可是我把专业从商业改成了戏剧. Oh 我的天.
english: And I had changed my major from business to theater arts. Oh well.

chinese: 可不管怎么说, Danny,你现在这份工作正好要用上戏剧专业的知识.
english: Besides, Danny, you're using that theatrical stuff in your job now.

chinese: Oh 是的, 复印社里总要发生一些戏剧性的事件.
english: Oh yeah, it's always a show down at the copy place.

chinese: 你那部电影怎么样了, Michael?
english: How's your film coming, Michael?

chinese: 你也要打破常规吗?
english: Are you breaking any rules?

chinese: 我想不会.
english: I don't think so.

chinese: 我的指导老师问谁对我的影响最大.
english: My advisor asked me who my major influence has been.

chinese: 我告诉他说每个星期都不一样.
english: I told him it changes every week.

chinese: 我还没有发现什么常规呢.
english: I haven't even found the rules yet.

chinese: Well, 等你发现了, 你就知道该怎么干了.
english: Well, you'll know what to do when you find them.

chinese: 打破常规!
english: Break'em!
